alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Macon; Sumner; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Davidson, western Rutherford, Sumner, eastern Williamson, Wilson, western Macon and Trousdale Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Portland to Thompson`s Station. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Gallatin, Lebanon, Lafayette, Hartsville, Hendersonville, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Spring Hill, Mount Juliet, Nolensville, Oak Hill, Lakewood, Westmoreland, Thompson`s Station, Portland, Hermitage and Walterhill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 212 and 243. Interstate 65 between mile markers 53 and 79. Interstate 24 between mile markers 52 and 78. Interstate 840 between mile markers 28 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
